lines.i: Information regarding the EMS crew's response to dispatch

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.3"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10573)/@code="67664-3" EMS response Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10572)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title and SHOULD equal "EMS Response" (CONF:10575)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10995)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Delay Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.95)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10997)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Dispatch Location Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.96)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10999)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response Odometer Reading Organizer (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.97)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11001)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Response Mode To Scene (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.182)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:11329)
Contains exactly one [1..1] Unit Level Of Care Capability (templateId: 2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.190)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10573)/@code="67664-3" EMS response Narrative NEMSIS (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10572)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHALL contain [1..1] entry (CONF:10997)
